	22.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Environmental compliance
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	Each Borrower and each Guarantor shall (and shall procure that each other Security Party shall comply):
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B424CA82EE9046448B32364D24CB5817" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	comply with all Environmental Laws;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="6904861B17174CE2A8A71533AFD7D48C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	obtain, maintain and ensure compliance with all requisite Environmental Approvals; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A028CB70DEFC4AA58D97A401FD265CCA" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.3.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	implement procedures to monitor compliance with and to prevent liability under any Environmental Law, where failure to do so has or is reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A99BC239398E4839A188ECEA14820654" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Environmental Claims
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	Each Borrower and each Guarantor shall promptly upon becoming aware of the same, inform the Agent in writing of:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="6C84534092914AD59C754567C1213681" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.4.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any Environmental Claim against any of the Security Parties which is current, pending or threatened; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F39C0EEA403F4BCF8480AEE1A6A251B3" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.4.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any facts or circumstances which are reasonably likely to result in any Environmental Claim being commenced or threatened against any of the Security Parties, where the claim, if determined against that Security Party, has or is reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="4160FA1D9A6A4AF886F2676BB8BB8B0F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Anti-corruption law
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="FFEA4A617ED1472983A4FE0D81F628B1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.5.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Each Borrower and each Guarantor shall not (and shall procure that no other Security Party will) directly or indirectly use the proceeds of the Loan for any purpose which would breach the Bribery Act 2010, the United States Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977 or other similar legislation in other jurisdictions.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B4595F0349954D91A160CE932066CCF5" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.5.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Each Borrower and each Guarantor shall (and shall procure that each other Security Party shall):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="96D31E167461410095DECA9ECF7799B8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	conduct its businesses in compliance with applicable anti-corruption laws; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="3D53AC85FD7F49E1894FA20D251422E1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	maintain policies and procedures designed to promote and achieve compliance with such laws.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="8252F4B33A84417FB9FAADC8A619C662" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Taxation
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D3D50E8B75A043E99382D1F458EDC6AB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.6.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Each Borrower and each Guarantor shall (and shall procure that each other Security Party shall) pay and discharge all Taxes imposed upon it or its
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 68
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage222"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 144PT">
	assets within the time period allowed without incurring penalties unless and only to the extent that:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="7755B2EE18A4421C8479D0442AD751A7" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	such payment is being contested in good faith;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="93D2CC2F290040018F76A53F3B5A971A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	adequate reserves are being maintained for those Taxes and the costs required to contest them which have been disclosed in its latest financial statements delivered to the Agent under Clause 20.1 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Financial statements
</FONT>
	);
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="DC596D7FEBDC48B7A6CDB9830DC15E5E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	such payment can be lawfully withheld and failure to pay those Taxes does not have or is not reasonably likely to have a Material Adverse Effect.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="5C2F203D4FF248B18018DB266747F3AD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.6.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Neither any Borrower nor any Guarantor may (and no other Security Party may) change its residence for Tax purposes.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="277C71A3389542DCBA1465D0CAF214B5" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Evidence of good standing&#160;
</FONT>
	Each Borrower will from time to time if requested by the Agent provide the Agent with evidence in form and substance satisfactory to the Agent that the Security Parties and all corporate shareholders of any of the Security Parties (other than of the Original Guarantor) remain in good standing.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E463F08843B94B6DA6D06DF9FE595A94" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Pari passu ranking&#160;
</FONT>
	Each Borrower and each Guarantor shall ensure that at all times any unsecured and unsubordinated claims of a Finance Party against it under the Finance Documents rank at least
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	pari passu
</FONT>
	with the claims of all its other unsecured and unsubordinated creditors except those creditors whose claims are mandatorily preferred by laws of general application to companies.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A766FD6F351949BCB4FF3896D7BA95E0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Negative pledge
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	Except as permitted under Clause 22.9.3:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="937BF6D14341405AA8DA91B533DAFF44" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.9.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not create nor permit to subsist any Encumbrance over any of its assets.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="86EE77CA137E4FA6ACCEEDC387F09238" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.9.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B50A5B149CB44663A1366F3B93D3B901" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	sell, transfer or otherwise dispose of any of its assets on terms whereby they are or may be leased to or re-acquired by a Security Party;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="0E2909FFDC0040999540F7A2227F19C0" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	sell, transfer or otherwise dispose of any of its receivables on recourse terms;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="6A22222D09434F91AE2BB9A87F99822C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	enter into any arrangement under which money or the benefit of a bank or other account may be applied, set-off or made subject to a combination of accounts; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="28BBE659FA47451181AEC42EF3D9D188" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	enter into any other preferential arrangement having a similar effect,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 144PT">
	in circumstances where the arrangement or transaction is entered into primarily as a method of raising Financial Indebtedness or of financing the acquisition of an asset.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 69
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage223"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="3D28436081D644F18E8203503F19033B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.9.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Clauses 22.9.1 and 22.9.2 do not apply to any Encumbrance which is a Permitted Encumbrance.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="FB685A45E05C4393B9BFDCB6ACDB2A72" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.10
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Disposals
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="CBBFDC278A8E4FBBBDFAE81379B89D55" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.10.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Except as permitted under Clause 22.10.2, no Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not enter into a single transaction or a series of transactions (whether related or not) and whether voluntary or involuntary to sell, lease, transfer or otherwise dispose of any asset.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="7FFA76C2BFD84BCEBB960296FDA12496" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.10.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Clause 22.10.1 does not apply to any sale, lease, transfer or other disposal which is a Permitted Disposal.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="CBECA69D309140DFA714B5774E1D3F57" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.11
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Arm's length basis
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B00688789BE14CDFA943CB33D0D37E66" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.11.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Except as permitted under Clause 22.11.2, no Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not enter into any transaction with any person except on arm's length terms and for full market value.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="3BAB3A3DF94040DD93671DFB757718B6" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.11.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Fees, costs and expenses payable under the Relevant Documents in the amounts set out in the Relevant Documents delivered to the Agent under Clause 4.1 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Initial conditions precedent
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	or agreed by the Agent shall not be a breach of this Clause 22.11.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="23131FD19C85469F9D24420D42DF6957" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.12
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Merger&#160;
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not enter into any amalgamation, demerger, merger, consolidation or corporate reconstruction.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D21958442BCA4C1397392E5079293CDC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.13
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Original Guarantor change of name&#160;
</FONT>
	The Original Guarantor shall not change its name.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="337EAE7ABD0F47A9A650ED1E5EC18813" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.14
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Change of business&#160;
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not make any substantial change to the general nature of its business from that carried on at the date of this Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E717BDF781254305ADC9968CCCA45AA9" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.15
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No other business&#160;
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not engage in any business other than the ownership, operation, chartering and management of the relevant Vessel or (as the case may be) the Collateral Vessel.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="7CA199C2C68E4510A1CA7A48205AA613" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.16
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No acquisitions&#160;
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not acquire a company or any shares or securities or a business or undertaking (or, in each case, any interest in any of them) or incorporate a company.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="0D4399B70DC74DDCB40EF2EE7674B383" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.17
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No Joint Ventures
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="50D4A501F3334CB9B3BCDF244183403E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.17.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	enter into, invest in or acquire (or agree to acquire) any shares, stocks, securities or other interest in any Joint Venture; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F4A2558DA21A49A6A83EA401597EA69C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.17.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	transfer any assets or lend to or guarantee or give an indemnity for or give security for the obligations of a Joint Venture or maintain the solvency of or provide working capital to any Joint Venture (or agree to do any of the foregoing).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="471D547D5C764AB7B14C3A609537CF71" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.18
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No borrowings&#160;
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not incur or allow to remain outstanding any Financial Indebtedness (except for the Loan).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 70
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage224"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="5000B608D55E4326ACAC58721D827B0B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.19
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No substantial liabilities&#160;
</FONT>
	Except in the ordinary course of business, no Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not incur any liability to any third party which is in the Agent's opinion of a substantial nature.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="6DAD8790551F4E1CB6305484E66D1FEC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.20
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No loans or credit&#160;
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not be a creditor in respect of any Financial Indebtedness.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="2C6CF45A64634C6F9F42AC7765B11ACF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.21
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No guarantees or indemnities&#160;
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall and the Collateral Owner shall not incur or allow to remain outstanding any guarantee in respect of any obligation of any person.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="7DD47BDAAC9D47F6BC74E021CA56BCF4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.22
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	No dividends
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="870A863ABD85413F809AD1129FC1EE55" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.22.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	No Borrower nor any Guarantor shall:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="04EF96857E9C4C9D901299A3143E4D5E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	declare, make or pay any dividend, charge, fee or other distribution (or interest on any unpaid dividend, charge, fee or other distribution) (whether in cash or in kind) on or in respect of its share capital (or any class of its share capital);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F6C725D59C744F938C6A8062207336D2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	repay or distribute any dividend or share premium reserve; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="61B1048F1E224EBDBA50787CE17B53F8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	redeem, repurchase, defease, retire or repay any of its share capital or resolve to do so,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 144PT">
	if to do so would result in a breach of Clause 21 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Financial Covenants
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	or if an Event of Default is confirming, or, in respect of the Borrowers only, issue any new shares in its share capital or resolve to do so which would not be subject to a Shares Pledge.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F083521DD4FD4D1F9AB83BC87C4DA219" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.23
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No change in Relevant Documents
</FONT>
	Neither any Borrower nor any Guarantor shall (and the Borrowers shall procure that no other Security Party will) amend, vary, novate, supplement, supersede, waive or terminate any term of, any of the Relevant Documents (other than the Original Guarantor's constitutional documents) which are not Finance Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="4EBB09C0BAE34C2B88BD52A6A072F442" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.24
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Further assurance
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="2D066497DCB147A4A9A4DF10B93F4943" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.24.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Each Borrower and each Guarantor shall (and shall procure that each other Security Party shall) promptly do all such acts or execute all such documents (including assignments, transfers, mortgages, charges, notices and instructions) as the Security Agent may reasonably specify (and in such form as the Security Agent may reasonably require in favour of the Security Agent or its nominee(s)):
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="13F4089B2A37478F96DBF74F740B5059" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	to perfect any Encumbrance created or intended to be created under or evidenced by the Security Documents (which may include the execution of a mortgage, charge, assignment or other Encumbrance over all or any of the assets which are, or are intended to be, the subject of the Security Documents) or for the exercise of any rights, powers and remedies of the Security Agent or the Finance Parties provided by or pursuant to the Finance Documents or by law;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>

	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="21DB89B1497C43D0A30EE0A3A941CCAD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Each Borrower and each Guarantor shall (and shall procure that each other Security Party shall) take all such action as is available to it (including making all filings and registrations) as may be necessary for the purpose of the creation, perfection, protection or maintenance of any Encumbrance conferred or intended to be conferred on the Security Agent or the Finance Parties by or pursuant to the Finance Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="436EBC2DD9AF4A1A993E300B6770F907" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No dealings with Master Agreements&#160;
</FONT>
	No Borrower shall assign, novate or encumber or in any other way transfer any of its rights or obligations under any Master Agreement, nor enter into any interest rate exchange or hedging agreement with anyone other than a Swap Provider.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</TD>

	Securities Purchase Agreement&#160;
</FONT>
	The Original Guarantor shall procure that there is no amendment to the terms of the Securities Purchase Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>

	DSI Loan&#160;
</FONT>
	The Borrowers and the Original Guarantor shall procure that:
</TD>
</TR>

<DIV>
	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C0C5550320534CA6886007120C60B62B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	there shall be no amendment to the terms of the DSI Loan save as permitted by this Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>

</TD>

</TD>

</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="072E49B8AB004936B8857A0B95F4B559" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	no Encumbrance may be granted over any assets of the Group in favour of DSI as security for the DSI Loan save for Encumbrances in respect of the m.v. "PUELO", a vessel in the ownership of Eluk registered under the flag of the Marshall Islands.

	Management of Original Guarantor&#160;
</FONT>
	The Original Guarantor shall procure that the Executive Managers remain as the chairman of the board of directors and chief executive officer of the Original Guarantor and a director and the president of the Original Guarantor respectively, or such other persons as may be approved by the Agent.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&#160;

	the members of the Families and DSI shall individually or in aggregate own not less than 20
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TEXT-TOP; LINE-HEIGHT: 1; FONT-SIZE: SMALLER;">
	0
</SUP>
	/0 of the issued shares in the Original Guarantor;

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	no single entity or group of related parties under common ultimate ownership shall
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="755B186E7E054788ABA5AD2731252DCA" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	individually or in aggregate own directly or indirectly more than 50% of the issued shares in the Original Guarantor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="5E1BD38D717C4B6392CBC91F3468E008" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	make, or in any way participate, directly or indirectly in any solicitation of proxies to vote that would result in such entity or group having control of more than 50% of the voting rights in the Original Guarantor;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="80F8C64647DA4B36AB808A192230E9FD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	form, join or in any way participate in a group in order to accomplish either of (a) or (b) above; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E33A903B6B51454492CCA0E5E933B59F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	knowingly advise, assist or encourage any entity in order to accomplish either of (a) or (b) above.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ECB2FE97119544FAB8FEE26E414FC5F9" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	22.29.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	without the prior written consent of the Agent, there shall be no change in the legal ownership of any Borrower or the Collateral Owner from that advised to the Agent by the Borrowers on the date of this Agreement or in the ability of a person to appoint a majority to the board of directors of any Borrower or the Collateral Owner; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D692F7689B484FF585983F054E37A606" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	22.29.4
</TD>

	no bearer shares shall be issued by any of the Security Parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D4D6FD42D9F045B9A714CDEB5531DC1E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

	22.30
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	NASDAQ listing&#160;
</FONT>
	The Original Guarantor shall remain listed on the NASDAQ exchange.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="27DF3D940A5948D6A56EF4258EE20C14" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.31
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Master Agreements&#160;
</FONT>
	If a Swap Provider and the Borrowers enter into a Master Agreement after the date on which any Mortgage is executed and registered in favour of the Security Agent, the Borrowers shall execute and deliver to the Security Agent any amendment or addendum to each Mortgage to secure that part of the Indebtedness relating to the Master Agreement, together with such supporting documentation at the Agent may reasonably require.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A36C0B6339224F49808A0DF3BA773843" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.32
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Master Agreement Proceeds Charge&#160;
</FONT>
	In the event that a Swap Provider and the Borrowers enter into a Master Agreement, the Borrowers shall execute and deliver to the Security Agent a Master Agreement Proceeds Charge, together with such supporting documentation at the Agent may reasonably require.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="97FE1CFDF8A3499C8052A17265D1989E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	22.33
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Clear Market
</FONT>
	During the period commencing on the date of this Agreement until 31 January 2016, the Borrowers and the Original Guarantor shall not and shall procure that no other member of the Group shall announce, enter into discussions to raise, raise or attempt to raise any other finance in the international or any relevant domestic syndicated loan, debt, bank, capital or equity market (including, but not limited to, any bilateral or syndicated facility, bond or note issuance or private placement) without the prior written consent of the Arranger.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="863F365713204B22A93AB08EF3765A92" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	23
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Events of Default
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="AB278234C5E04736A33E08A302C2EA45" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	23.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Events of Default&#160;
</FONT>
	Each of the events or circumstances set out in this Clause 23.1 is an Event of Default.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F82C7D9785D94EB1910DC7396CFB1790" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	23.1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Non-payment&#160;
</FONT>
	A Security Party does not pay on the due date any amount payable by it under a Finance Document at the place at and in the currency in which it is expressed to be payable unless:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="24A3DB02F8E34BBBBAEF33E979138E37" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	its failure to pay is caused by:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E501338C9545497C85A3D86F59465951" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	administrative or technical error; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9037BBC06EC94779BD5A4AE599269BF5" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 180PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(ii)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	a Disruption Event; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9FC380EAC51D462FB2CA069887C0FB18" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>

	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	payment is made within two Business Days of its due date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="6B29041435A1436CA3DA3426734E942D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	23.1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Other specific obligations&#160;
</FONT>
	A Security Party does not comply with:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A0A90BA98BDE4E50B18AE9E4B9FD1743" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

</TD>

	any requirement of Clause 21 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Financial Covenants
</FONT>
	);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="2BF482704A3C46F0AC495BFCEF99E5DE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

</TD>

	any obligation in a Finance Document relating to the Insurances;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="65088502191A48BF93F1793BE5F83FD4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	any obligation in Clause 17.12 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Additional security
</FONT>
	);
</TD>

</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="3954B81AE7A542C0A655A14E13459D4A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any obligation in Clause 17.14 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Liquidity Account
</FONT>
	);
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B2EA8C5420AA4F73A49CE54BCDBBAEB4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	(e)

	any obligation in Clause 22.26 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Securities Purchase Agreement
</FONT>
	),

	&#160;

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">

	),
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">

	23.1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Other obligations
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D0732D8498C144F9AD47831C9FD1C276" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	A Security Party does not comply with any provision of a Finance Document (other than those referred to in Clause 23.1.1 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Non-payment
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	and Clause 23.1.2 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Other specific obligations
</FONT>
	))
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="2F5B413DAB63425190CAAA8349B1FDDE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	No Event of Default under this Clause 23.1.3 will occur if the failure to comply is capable of remedy and is remedied within ten Business Days of the earlier of (i) the Agent giving notice to the Borrowers and (ii) the Borrowers becoming aware of the failure to comply.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="00F487A18CB643508D818EA572CF3657" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	23.1.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Misrepresentation&#160;
</FONT>
	Any representation or statement made or deemed to be repeated by a Security Party in any Finance Document or any other document delivered by or on behalf of a Security Party under or in connection with any Finance Document is or proves to have been incorrect or misleading when made or deemed to be made.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="5B261F8E9B45450399FF7B798FA03A7D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 97PX">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 94PX; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	23.1.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Cross default&#160;
</FONT>
	Any Financial Indebtedness of a Security Party or any other member of the Group:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E0FD485541AA4C0997E7997D64388ADF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	is not paid when due nor within any originally applicable grace period; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E18CF4840E2B40F087112DDFF5C3E073" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	is declared to be, or otherwise becomes, due and payable prior to its specified maturity as a result of an event of default (however described); or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</TD>

	(c)
</TD>

	is capable of being declared by a creditor to be due and payable prior to its specified maturity as a result of such an event
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 144PT">
	No Event of Default will occur under this Clause 23.1.5 if the aggregate amount of Financial Indebtedness or commitment for Financial Indebtedness falling within Clause (a) to (c) in respect of the Original Guarantor only is less than $3,000,000 (or its equivalent in any other currency or currencies).
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B71DCC21DF004F56925BA2A8CD8B2BBD" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	23.1.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Insolvency
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B169874532BD47F697EBED94B5B76E0B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	A Security Party or any other member of the Group is unable or admits inability to pay its debts as they fall due, is deemed to, or is declared to, be unable to pay its debts under applicable law, suspends or threatens to suspend making payments on any of its debts, or, by reason of actual or anticipated financial difficulties, commences negotiations with one or more of its creditors with a view to rescheduling any of its indebtedness.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="FF513CAF44E5493EBCD082520143AF70" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	The value of the assets of the Original Guarantor is less than its liabilities (taking into account contingent and prospective liabilities).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="6A2C1DA6680D46FD9304BD1AC1D497C2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	A moratorium is declared in respect of any indebtedness of a Security Party or any other member of the Group. If a moratorium occurs, the ending of the moratorium will not remedy any Event of Default caused by that moratorium.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9068C34A360A4753A51015151C09AA94" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	23.1.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Insolvency proceedings&#160;
</FONT>
	Any corporate action, legal proceedings or other procedure or step is taken for:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="962D1C7263DA44F49424BE7F8F6044FE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the suspension of payments, a moratorium of any indebtedness, winding-up, dissolution, administration, bankruptcy or reorganisation (by way of voluntary arrangement, scheme of arrangement or otherwise) of a Security Party or any other member of the Group;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="1296806305474C9BB26B7B9A1C74DDD3" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	a composition, compromise, assignment or arrangement with any creditor of a Security Party or any other member of the Group;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="980D9A685DCE43358666DAA4EFBDECFC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the appointment of a liquidator, receiver, administrative receiver, administrator, compulsory manager, or trustee or other similar officer in respect of a Security Party or any other member of the Group or any of its assets; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F2ADE27E768C41EC9FC1B9913423D469" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
