<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="FE680B7A634C474B93E7D236FAD9E788" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	26.17
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Credit appraisal by the Lenders&#160;
</FONT>
	Without affecting the responsibility of any Security Party for information supplied by it or on its behalf in connection with any Relevant Document, each Lender confirms to the Agent and the Arranger that it has been, and will continue to be, solely responsible for making its own independent appraisal and investigation of all risks arising under or in connection with any Relevant Document including but not limited to:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="4E81158A26B34DEEB8A56672E44E68FF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	26.17.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the financial condition, status and nature of each Security Party;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C040541732944A4B8158EFC73F4F362D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	26.17.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the legality, validity, effectiveness, adequacy or enforceability of any Relevant Document and any other agreement, arrangement or document entered into, made or executed in anticipation of, under or in connection with any Relevant Document;
</TD>
</TR>

</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="055AFAEB19B14DF0A0914B7E1E8FE1C8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

</TD>

	26.17.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	whether that Lender has recourse, and the nature and extent of that recourse, against any Party or any of its respective assets under or in connection with any Relevant Document, the transactions contemplated by the Relevant Documents or any other agreement, arrangement or document entered into, made or executed in anticipation of under or in connection with any Relevant Document; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="838543DD80F849FC9962DC6DF75FFCC2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	26.17.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the right or title of any person in or to, or the value or sufficiency of any part of the Charged Property, the priority of any Encumbrance created or expressed to be created or evidenced by the Security Documents or the existence of any Encumbrance affecting the Charged Property.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="26B15456C6034A8CA05C561CB865C340" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	26.18
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Reference Banks&#160;
</FONT>
	If a Reference Bank (or, if a Reference Bank is not a Lender, the Lender of which it is an Affiliate) ceases to be a Lender, the Agent shall (in consultation with the Borrowers) appoint another Lender or an Affiliate of a Lender to replace that Reference Bank.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E5412565520F423588EB134D288C94F5" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	26.19
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Deduction from amounts payable by the Agent&#160;
</FONT>
	If any Party owes an amount to the Agent under the Finance Documents the Agent may, after giving notice to that Party, deduct an amount not exceeding that amount from any payment to that Party which the Agent would otherwise be obliged to make under the Finance Documents and apply the amount deducted in or towards satisfaction of the amount owed. For the purposes of the Finance Documents that Party shall be regarded as having received any amount so deducted.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="1F236A50C78B44149F2D693D62795BC1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	27
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Conduct of Business by the Finance Parties
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	No provision of this Agreement will:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="679B6D9377AC4175962B2E9512C6444A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	27.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	interfere with the right of any Finance Party to arrange its affairs (tax or otherwise) in whatever manner it thinks fit;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B86562337CA74A77BABC7C83D03E2751" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	27.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	oblige any Finance Party to investigate or claim any credit, relief, remission or repayment available to it or the extent, order and manner of any claim; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="495790FD4B954775871D2F69E0BDF515" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	27.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	oblige any Finance Party to disclose any information relating to its affairs (tax or otherwise) or any computations in respect of Tax.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 99
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage253"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="5EAB1ED7CB7E4460832F83A6B15D97DB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Sharing among the Finance Parties
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="502C5C0216C74D8C8C3886D46324F54E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Payments to Finance Parties&#160;
</FONT>
	If a Finance Party (a "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Recovering
</FONT>
	&#160;
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Finance Party
</FONT>
	")
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	receives or recovers any amount from a Security Party other than in accordance with Clause 29 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Payment Mechanics
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	(a "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Recovered Amount
</FONT>
	")
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	and applies that amount to a payment due under the Finance Documents then:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C7A7FD31C0BC4DA5A3BF0D34157D45D2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Recovering Finance Party shall, within three Business Days, notify details of the receipt or recovery, to the Agent;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="92E407F1EE684CCB9877BBD318CD95C5" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Agent shall determine whether the receipt or recovery is in excess of the amount the Recovering Finance Party would have been paid had the receipt or recovery been received or made by the Agent and distributed in accordance with Clause 29 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Payment Mechanics
</FONT>
	),
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	without taking account of any Tax which would be imposed on the Agent in relation to the receipt, recovery or distribution; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9C9B2881D9AF4DA39B3115E568C4B403" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Recovering Finance Party shall, within three Business Days of demand by the Agent, pay to the Agent an amount (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Sharing Payment
</FONT>
	")
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	equal to such receipt or recovery less any amount which the Agent determines may be retained by the Recovering Finance Party as its share of any payment to be made, in accordance with Clause 29.6 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Partial payments
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9ECA2F1F035042E1B58582215A74DD98" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Redistribution of payments&#160;
</FONT>
	The Agent shall treat the Sharing Payment as if it had been paid by the relevant Security Party and distribute it between the Finance Parties (other than the Recovering Finance Party) (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Sharing Finance Parties
</FONT>
	")
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	in accordance with Clause 29.6 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Partial payments
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	towards the obligations of that Security Party to the Sharing Finance Parties.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C88722DC9DB4455691F0425D73FE7B19" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Recovering Finance Party's rights&#160;
</FONT>
	On a distribution by the Agent under Clause 28.2 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Redistribution of payments
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	of a payment received by a Recovering Finance Party from a Security Party, as between the relevant Security Party and the Recovering Finance Party, an amount of the Recovered Amount equal to the Sharing Payment will be treated as not having been paid by that Security Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E3D04A0763BC473F8F0D88A7F815AB91" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Reversal of redistribution&#160;
</FONT>
	If any part of the Sharing Payment received or recovered by a Recovering Finance Party becomes repayable and is repaid by that Recovering Finance Party, then:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C0681005BBEC4689BC3E2C05E461EE2F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.4.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	each Sharing Finance Party shall, upon request of the Agent, pay to the Agent for the account of that Recovering Finance Party an amount equal to the appropriate part of its share of the Sharing Payment (together with an amount as is necessary to reimburse that Recovering Finance Party for its proportion of any interest on the Sharing Payment which that Recovering Finance Party is required to pay) (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Redistributed Amount
</FONT>
	");
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9949444CEEA644058F74A1ABCC4BB910" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.4.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	as between the relevant Security Party and each relevant Sharing Finance Party, an amount equal to the relevant Redistributed Amount will be treated as not having been paid by that Security Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 100
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage254"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="82AF685E4BF641C49A02C3C0A6BBEECE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Exceptions
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="CB913F78375142B8B3887EA03AD7143D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.5.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	This Clause 28 shall not apply to the extent that the Recovering Finance Party would not, after making any payment pursuant to this Clause, have a valid and enforceable claim against the relevant Security Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="4272C631EDE54471BCF19FD23AD3EDBE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	28.5.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	A Recovering Finance Party is not obliged to share with any other Finance Party any amount which the Recovering Finance Party has received or recovered as a result of taking legal or arbitration proceedings, if:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="10E8C18911B34F8083FA18333633090E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	it notified that other Finance Party of the legal or arbitration proceedings; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B4BB44B9D2D24641ADE3F4CF03A8E21B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	that other Finance Party had an opportunity to participate in those legal or arbitration proceedings but did not do so as soon as reasonably practicable having received notice and did not take separate legal or arbitration proceedings.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 101
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage255"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="DAE0C33665CE44B38280EA58EDC9F608" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 108PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Section 11
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Administration
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D9E3ACD9FA4549D2B1B0FF6C422C93EF" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Payment Mechanics
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="5E9B79B0BB0D4BCBB569C7181816B904" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Payments to the Agent&#160;
</FONT>
	On each date on which a Security Party or a Lender is required to make a payment under a Finance Document (other than any Master Agreement), that Security Party or that Lender shall make the same available to the Agent for value on the due date at the time and in such funds specified by the Agent as being customary at the time for settlement of transactions in the relevant currency in the place of payment.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	Payment shall be made to such account in the principal financial centre of the country of that currency with such bank as the Agent specifies.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E15C09D9C64F406FBACE07FA173E3843" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Distributions by the Agent&#160;
</FONT>
	Each payment received by the Agent under the Finance Documents for another Party shall, subject to Clause 29.3 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Distributions to a Security Party
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	and Clause 29.4 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Clawback and pre-funding
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	be made available by the Agent as soon as practicable after receipt to the Party entitled to receive payment in accordance with this Agreement (in the case of a Lender, for the account of its Facility Office), to such account as that Party may notify to the Agent by not less than five Business Days' notice with a bank specified by that Party in the principal financial centre of the country of that currency.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="4A1A63E439E94C1B96651F73E63AE858" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Distributions to a Security Party&#160;
</FONT>
	The Agent may (with the consent of a Security Party or in accordance with Clause 30 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Set-Off
</FONT>
	))
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	apply any amount received by it for that Security Party in or towards payment (on the date and in the currency and funds of receipt) of any amount due from that Security Party under the Finance Documents or in or towards purchase of any amount of any currency to be so applied.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9400F840164345769E16FB5787EBD300" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Clawback and pre-funding
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="3ACEF303AE98451C810A6BC8B390F7BB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.4.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Where a sum is to be paid to the Agent under the Finance Documents for another Party, the Agent is not obliged to pay that sum to that other Party (or to enter into or perform any related exchange contract) until it has been able to establish to its satisfaction that it has actually received that sum.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="EEE14A34ABAD4425B03632ABBF191BB2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.4.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Unless Clause 29.4.3 applies, if the Agent pays an amount to another Party and it proves to be the case that the Agent had not actually received that amount, then the Party to whom that amount (or the proceeds of any related exchange contract) was paid by the Agent shall on demand refund the same to the Agent together with interest on that amount from the date of payment to the date of receipt by the Agent, calculated by the Agent to reflect its cost of funds.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F580265254D2407494DC4704526F3771" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.4.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	If the Agent has notified the Lenders that it is willing to make available amounts for the account of a Borrower before receiving funds from the Lenders then if and to the extent that the Agent does so but it proves to be the case that it does not then receive funds from a Lender in respect of a sum which it paid to a Borrower:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 102
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage256"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D41EE6AA106D4836A8DA21197440620C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Agent shall notify the Borrowers of that Lender's identity and the Borrower to whom that sum was made available shall on demand refund it to the Agent; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E8F82DF87B454750B62B934960E4358A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Lender by whom those funds should have been made available or, if that Lender fails to do so, the Borrower to whom that sum was made available, shall on demand pay to the Agent the amount (as certified by the Agent) which will indemnify the Agent against any funding cost incurred by it as a result of paying out that sum before receiving those funds from that Lender.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="2F1457CBB70846338DBAC02F36967DA1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Impaired Agent
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="30D5B0F05FDA47FB845F6C06E401537D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.5.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	If, at any time, the Agent becomes an Impaired Agent, a Security Party or a Lender which is required to make a payment under the Finance Documents to the Agent in accordance with Clause 29.1 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Payments to the Agent
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	may instead either:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="702B4B0658BC478DA8C6D6C38E36AE50" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	pay that amount direct to the required recipient(s); or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="2B1D673EA29C43ACB25B84584A7803D4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	if in its absolute discretion it considers that it is not reasonably practicable to pay that amount direct to the required recipient(s), pay that amount or the relevant part of that amount to an interest-bearing account held with an Acceptable Bank in relation to which no Insolvency Event has occurred and is continuing, in the name of the Security Party or the Lender making the payment (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Paying Party
</FONT>
	")
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	and designated as a trust account for the benefit of the Party or Parties beneficially entitled to that payment under the Finance Documents (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Recipient Party
</FONT>
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	or "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Recipient Parties
</FONT>
	").
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 144PT">
	In each case such payments must be made on the due date for payment under the Finance Documents.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="68A331BD01934CF4BABD1F4ED68D8405" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.5.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	All interest accrued on the amount standing to the credit of the trust account shall be for the benefit of the Recipient Party or the Recipient Parties
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	pro rata
</FONT>
	to their respective entitlements.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A16AA138EE724E3D8127432D03C3415C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.5.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	A Party which has made a payment in accordance with this Clause 29.5 shall be discharged of the relevant payment obligation under the Finance Documents and shall not take any credit risk with respect to the amounts standing to the credit of the trust account.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9A543783FFC2419EABF43030080119D4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.5.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Promptly upon the appointment of a successor Agent in accordance with Clause 26.14 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Replacement of the Agent
</FONT>
	),
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	each Paying Party shall (other than to the extent that that Party has given an instruction pursuant to Clause 29.5.5) give all requisite instructions to the bank with whom the trust account is held to transfer the amount (together with any accrued interest) to the successor Agent for distribution to the relevant Recipient Party or Recipient Parties in accordance with Clause 29.2 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Distributions by the Agent
</FONT>
	)
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	.
</FONT>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 103
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage257"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D3235FA454FE46BEABD246A662A3EC41" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.5.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	A Paying Party shall, promptly upon request by a Recipient Party and to the extent:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A0727A841E414A6194680588C608AFF4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	that it has not given an instruction pursuant to Clause 29.5.4; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A31E7F27152648848BA863E9C0F79777" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	that it has been provided with the necessary information by that Recipient Party, gParty.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="60FBB678C5394E7F840E3C1B21C81950" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	give all requisite instructions to the bank with whom the trust account is held to transfer the relevant amount (together with any accrued interest) to that Recipient Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="6DCE41551E2A490EA027151F14035CEC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Partial payments
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="194B7AFEFB474E3C85CBED5BF0CDCE3E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.6.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	If the Agent receives a payment that is insufficient to discharge all the amounts then due and payable by a Security Party under the Finance Documents (other than any Master Agreement), the Agent shall apply that payment towards the obligations of that Security Party under the Finance Documents (other than any Master Agreement) in the following order:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="1EC4E41C39F54A799843D2F2964F5A74" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	first, in or towards payment pro rata of any unpaid fees, costs and expenses of the Agent or the Security Agent under the Finance Documents;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E8AA86DC53C2435D9545C73CB68B4128" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	secondly, in or towards payment pro rata of any accrued interest, fee or commission due but unpaid under this Agreement;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F1CAA66D55844A58B5F62CCF310569C4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(c)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	thirdly, in or towards payment pro rata of any principal due but unpaid under this Agreement; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="0AB173EE9EB649C6A47533DC83825B7E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(d)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	fourthly, in or towards payment pro rata of any other sum due but unpaid under the Finance Documents.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="455DCBBD0B1C4CA5AFBAC8B083D73ACC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.6.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	The Agent shall, if so directed by the Majority Lenders, vary the order set out in Clauses 29.6.1(b) to 29.6.1(d).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="CD9A0381E4D749DF98B052343F53BF20" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.6.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Clauses 29.6.1 and 29.6.2 will override any appropriation made by a Security Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="CA32A0ABF1CB49A685AAB27DA7C815E3" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No set-off by Security Parties&#160;
</FONT>
	All payments to be made by a Security Party under the Finance Documents shall be calculated and be made without (and free and clear of any deduction for) set-off or counterclaim.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F7B1A42848424BB7AF6859E9A22C4A87" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.8
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Business Days&#160;
</FONT>
	Any payment which is due to be made on a day that is not a Business Day shall be made on the next Business Day in the same calendar month (if there is one) or the preceding Business Day (if there is not).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	During any extension of the due date for payment of any principal or Unpaid Sum under this Agreement interest is payable on the principal or Unpaid Sum at the rate payable on the original due date.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 104
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage258"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="8A911A79391C46A1860A14867B54156F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.9
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Currency of account
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="2F1CADDCC8D94735B7F8F9255CCEE070" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.9.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Subject to Clauses 29.9.2 to 29.9.5, dollars is the currency of account and payment for any sum due from a Security Party under any Finance Document.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="009EF0A84868481D9004112460DFE66C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.9.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	A repayment or payment of all or part of the Loan or an Unpaid Sum shall be made in the currency in which the Loan or Unpaid Sum is denominated on its due date.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="1DB3270840AE4AE09DDF3AD73DC1B876" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.9.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Each payment of interest shall be made in the currency in which the sum in respect of which the interest is payable was denominated when that interest accrued.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C33D6751A24A44BAAF47A712609E6EC7" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.9.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Each payment in respect of costs, expenses or Taxes shall be made in the currency in which the costs, expenses or Taxes are incurred.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="836661E00CC44C4E9937B488D655D03C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.9.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Any amount expressed to be payable in a currency other than dollars shall be paid in that other currency.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B3108D1E89914435A9C1CBEF31B399D2" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.10
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Control account&#160;
</FONT>
	The Agent shall open and maintain on its books a control account in the names of the Borrowers showing the advance of the Loan and the computation and payment of interest and all other sums due under this Agreement. The Borrowers' obligations to repay the Loan and to pay interest and all other sums due under this Agreement shall be evidenced by the entries from time to time made in the control account opened and maintained under this Clause 29.10 and those entries will, in the absence of manifest error, be conclusive and binding.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="79FC0A195FAE4125B9AB96F435402AAA" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.11
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Change of currency
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="85EB8BBBBEA748739A021E791C298ECC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.11.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Unless otherwise prohibited by law, if more than one currency or currency unit are at the same time recognised by the central bank of any country as the lawful currency of that country, then:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="70ABC093B5E04110AC8194EC783116C8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any reference in the Finance Documents to, and any obligations arising under the Finance Documents in, the currency of that country shall be translated into, or paid in, the currency or currency unit of that country designated by the Agent (after consultation with the Borrowers); and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D804D7D5F08C4A068CF213E7B3947E3F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any translation from one currency or currency unit to another shall be at the official rate of exchange recognised by the central bank for the conversion of that currency or currency unit into the other, rounded up or down by the Agent (acting reasonably).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="4D679A51577746F9846F05F3E36B3A6C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.11.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	If a change in any currency of a country occurs, this Agreement will, to the extent the Agent (acting reasonably and after consultation with the Borrowers) specifies to be necessary, be amended to comply with any generally accepted conventions and market practice in the Relevant Interbank Market and otherwise to reflect the change in currency.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">

	Page 105

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="574B3B6D12A04D1AA06E7C0F77E15248" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.12
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Disruption to payment systems etc.&#160;
</FONT>
	If either the Agent determines in its discretion that a Disruption Event has occurred or the Agent is notified by the Borrowers that a Disruption Event has occurred:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C0CD05C7B071415998961C01E7304F85" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.12.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Agent may, and shall if requested to do so by the Borrowers, consult with the Borrowers with a view to agreeing with the Borrowers such changes to the operation or administration of the Loan as the Agent may deem necessary in the circumstances;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="FE7B8B824453440AB5A636DC384B8211" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.12.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Agent shall not be obliged to consult with the Borrowers in relation to any changes mentioned in Clause 29.12.1 if, in its opinion, it is not practicable to do so in the circumstances and, in any event, shall have no obligation to agree to any such changes;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A02A3E9B42784C37B5967E5CA0C5C58C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	29.12.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Agent may consult with the Finance Parties in relation to any changes mentioned in Clause 29.12.1 but shall not be obliged to do so if, in its opinion, it is not practicable to do so in the circumstances;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C248254C41EF440CB62A7B441F3A65EE" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>

	29.12.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any such changes agreed upon by the Agent and the Borrowers shall (whether or not it is finally determined that a Disruption Event has occurred) be binding upon the Parties as an amendment to (or, as the case may be, waiver of) the terms of the Finance Documents notwithstanding the provisions of Clause 35 (
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-STYLE: ITALIC">
	Amendments and Waivers
</FONT>
	);
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F2248DCC0BF047D09EF2E412099048B8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	29.12.5
</TD>

	the Agent shall not be liable for any damages, costs or losses whatsoever (including, without limitation, for negligence, gross negligence or any other category of liability whatsoever but not including any claim based on the fraud of the Agent) arising as a result of its taking, or failing to take, any actions pursuant to or in connection with this Clause 29.12; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9787AB18327A4B9BB01E7D85B1B84AEB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>

	29.12.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the Agent shall notify the Finance Parties of all changes agreed pursuant to Clause 29.12.4.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="186137969EC346CFB2200CE67EAAA23B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	30
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Set-Off
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ADB1BF610F06409F93759FB685CB8640" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	30.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Set-off&#160;
</FONT>
	A Finance Party may set off any matured obligation due from a Security Party under the Finance Documents (to the extent beneficially owned by that Finance Party) against any matured obligation owed by that Finance Party to that Security Party, regardless of the place of payment, booking branch or currency of either obligation.&#160; If the obligations are in different currencies, the Finance Party may&#160; convert either obligation at a market rate of exchange in its usual course of business for the purpose of the set-off.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="32AEA78B96A343369B9938A60BFD35CB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	30.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Master Agreement rights&#160;
</FONT>
	The rights conferred on each Swap Provider by this Clause 30 shall be in addition to, and without prejudice to or limitation of, the rights of netting and set off conferred on each Swap Provider by each Master Agreement.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="CF7F3FE128B94B62BBCC256541D24787" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	31
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Notices
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="1B459648ADBF45BE8E44443DE8363FEA" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	31.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Communications in writing&#160;
</FONT>
	Any communication to be made under or in connection with the Finance Documents shall be made in writing and, unless otherwise stated, may be made by fax or letter.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;

	Addresses&#160;
</FONT>
	The address and fax number (and the department or officer, if any, for whose attention the communication is to be made) of each Party for any communication or document to be made or delivered under or in connection with the Finance Documents is:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="84B5002475E3434193E670653A6B3E20" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	in the case of each Borrower, that identified with its name below;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C54880ED891A49D0AAAFEE7BEF21C0D3" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="18BF972403954BD6A6110E0A6A386489" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
