	36.7
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Continuing obligations&#160;
</FONT>
	The obligations in this Clause 36 are continuing and, in particular, shall survive and remain binding on each Finance Party for a period of 12 months from the earlier of:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="319049F91D0D482AB6EC2F6BC8003825" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	36.7.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the date on which all amounts payable by the Security Parties under or in connection with the Finance Documents have been paid in full and the Loan has been cancelled or otherwise ceases to be available; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="CCDF6C67C8AF474180090B970B6DBB83" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	36.7.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the date on which such Finance Party otherwise ceases to be a Finance Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="324B597495A743458F4247B1E44B508C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	37
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Disclosure of Lender Details by Agent
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="68B2CA91B99940B19F5BABC843DF3D6A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	37.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Supply of Lender details to Borrowers&#160;
</FONT>
	The Agent shall provide to the Borrowers within seven Business Days of a request by the Borrowers (but no more frequently than once per calendar month) a list (which may be in electronic form) setting out
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 117
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">

</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage271"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	the names of the Lenders as at the date of that request, their respective Commitments, the address and fax number (and the department or officer, if any, for whose attention any communication is to be made) of each Lender for any communication to be made or document to be delivered under or in connection with the Finance Documents and the account details of each Lender for any payment to be distributed by the Agent to that Lender under the Finance Documents.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Supply of Lender details at Borrowers' direction
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>

	37.2.1
</TD>

</TD>

</TABLE>

<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	other Party or any other person if that disclosure is made to facilitate, in each case, a refinancing of the Financial Indebtedness arising under the Finance Documents or a material waiver or amendment of any term of any Finance Document; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	Security Party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A8CA69FA69BB4F06985890B4C23CEA84" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	37.2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Subject to Clause 37.2.3, the Borrowers shall procure that the recipient of information disclosed pursuant to Clause 37.2.1 shall keep such information confidential and shall not disclose it to anyone and shall ensure that all such information is protected with security measures and a degree of care that would apply to the recipient's own confidential information.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="179ABE03C01944B9A9577861485EF488" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	37.2.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	The recipient may disclose such information to any of its officers, directors, employees, professional advisers, auditors and partners as it shall consider appropriate if any such person is informed in writing of its confidential nature, except that there shall be no such requirement to so inform if that person is subject to professional obligations to maintain the confidentiality of the information or is otherwise bound by duties of confidentiality in relation to the information.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	37.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Supply of Lender details to other Lenders
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B96BCB91FE8044BF85466EA37F329672" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	37.3.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	If a Lender (a "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Disclosing Lender
</FONT>
	")
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	indicates to the Agent that the Agent may do so, the Agent shall disclose that Lender's name and Commitment to any other Lender that is, or becomes, a Disclosing Lender.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="1B7DE0F553764E6CA08D54B3A0A6107A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	37.3.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	The Agent shall, if so directed by the Requisite Lenders, request each Lender to indicate to it whether it is a Disclosing Lender.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	37.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Lender enquiry&#160;
</FONT>
	If any Lender believes that any entity is, or may be, a Lender and:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="BF5DB4A29352477987F7F72F6E42F438" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>

	37.4.1
</TD>

	that entity ceases to have an Investment Grade Rating; or

</TD>

	an Insolvency Event occurs in relation to that entity,
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 144PT">
	the Agent shall, at the request of that Lender, indicate to that Lender the extent to which that entity has a Commitment.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="34408A0A5A204906A3A64F4993214C7E" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

	37.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Lender details definitions
</FONT>
	&#160; In this Clause 37:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">
	Page 118
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage272"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Investment Grade Rating
</FONT>
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	means, in relation to an entity, a rating for its long-term unsecured and non-credit-enhanced debt obligations of BBB- or higher by Standard &amp; Poor's Rating Services or Fitch Ratings Ltd or Baa3 or higher by Moody's Investors Service Limited or a comparable rating from an internationally recognised credit rating agency.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Requisite Lenders
</FONT>
	"
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	means a Lender or Lenders whose Commitments aggregate 15 per cent (or more) of the Total Commitments (or if the Total Commitments have been reduced to zero, aggregated 15 per cent (or more) of the Total Commitments immediately prior to that reduction).
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="766BF7E21CFC48C99E2208BBEE8D7844" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	38
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Counterparts
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	Each Finance Document may be executed in any number of counterparts, and this has the same effect as if the signatures on the counterparts were on a single copy of the Finance Document.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="8160BAAACB4445E88BBB70266C7E2812" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Joint and Several Liability
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B0439F6835EE4B928B4FA4F2D88B11DB" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Nature of liability&#160;
</FONT>
	The representations, warranties, covenants, obligations and undertakings of the Borrowers contained in this Agreement shall be joint and several so that each Borrower shall be jointly and severally liable with all the Borrowers for all of the same and such liability shall not in any way be discharged, impaired or otherwise affected by:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="B2843C080D7C4EEEB92B49B88F2924C1" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39.1.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any forbearance (whether as to payment or otherwise) or any time or other indulgence granted to any other Borrower or any other Security Party under or in connection with any Finance Document;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A80A00F2D7FD483D8881AA7B1391728C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39.1.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any amendment, variation, novation or replacement of any other Finance Document;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="9DD22B46BA3B4F57B1662A4252F4CC5A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39.1.3
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any failure of any Finance Document to be legal valid binding and enforceable in relation to any other Borrower or any other Security Party for any reason;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="C456EEAB6E8C4D32B4C759529C964B42" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39.1.4
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the winding-up or dissolution of any other Borrower or any other Security Party;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="D72AFA46EA8145F2A0DEFBE460E8FFC4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39.1.5
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the release (whether in whole or in part) of, or the entering into of any compromise or composition with, any other Borrower or any other Security Party; or
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="3056EAF8C6CF4B1BA9B0596E8576EA2C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39.1.6
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	any other act, omission, thing or circumstance which would or might, but for this provision, operate to discharge, impair or otherwise affect such liability.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E32CE1D54272401C907D7CEBE30D5F40" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	39.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	No rights as surety&#160;
</FONT>
	Until the Indebtedness has been unconditionally and irrevocably paid and discharged in full, each Borrower agrees that it shall not, by virtue of any payment made under this Agreement on account of the Indebtedness or by virtue of any enforcement by a Finance Party of its rights under this Agreement or by virtue of any relationship between, or transaction involving, the relevant Borrower and any other Borrower or any other Security Party:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>

</TD>

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="4B342884052B470383D8B7B2BA68B08D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</TD>

	unless so directed by the Agent (when the relevant Borrower will prove in accordance with such directions), claim as a creditor of any other Borrower or any other Security Party in competition with any Finance Party
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	and each Borrower shall hold in trust for the Finance Parties and forthwith pay or transfer (as appropriate) to the Agent any such payment (including an amount equal to any such set-off), distribution or benefit of such security, indemnity or claim in fact received by it.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;

	Section 12
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">

</TD>
</TR>

</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="A80C4D3979C945ACA826772B1382DB30" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>

	40
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Governing Law
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	This Agreement and any non-contractual obligations arising out of or in connection with it are governed by English law.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="063140C2F2A64BFCAAC4B762FA03E71D" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	41
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Enforcement
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="13B1DF4B594043E8943B7A59D9C69AB8" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	41.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Jurisdiction of English courts&#160;
</FONT>
	The courts of England have exclusive jurisdiction to settle any dispute arising out of or in connection with this Agreement (including a dispute relating to the existence, validity or termination of this Agreement or any non-contractual obligation arising out of or in connection with this Agreement) (a "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Dispute
</FONT>
	").
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	&#160;
</FONT>
	Each Party agrees that the courts of England are the most appropriate and convenient courts to settle Disputes and accordingly no Party will argue to the contrary.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT">
	This Clause 41.1 is for the benefit of the Finance Parties only. As a result, no Finance Party shall be prevented from taking proceedings relating to a Dispute in any other courts with jurisdiction. To the extent allowed by law, any Finance Party may take concurrent proceedings in any number of jurisdictions.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="5A1C670FD0214E76A70445AB5D098798" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	41.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Service of process
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="BD86DEC7B7BD4784A850838E47C2A0A6" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	41.2.1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Without prejudice to any other mode of service allowed under any relevant law each Borrower and each Guarantor:
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="61BF4633DD6C4360BA9D4F6A64F233AA" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	irrevocably appoints Nicolaou &amp; Co of 25 Heath Drive, Potters Bar, Hertfordshire, EN6 1EN, England as its agent for service of process in relation to any proceedings before the English courts in connection with any Finance Document to which they are a party; and
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="65405EE0FC0E4E439D1A1F5ED0F2586C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 144PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(b)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	agrees that failure by a process agent to notify that Borrower or that Guarantor (as the case may be) of the process will not invalidate the proceedings concerned.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="7145A21A1A7C4C2BBF7F47C7C1177DDC" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 72PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 72PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	41.2.2
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	If any person appointed as an agent for service of process is unable for any reason to act as agent for service of process or terminates its appointment as agent for service of process, the relevant Borrower or relevant Guarantor (as the case may be) must immediately (and in any event within five days of such event taking place) appoint another agent on terms acceptable to the Agent. Failing this, the Agent may appoint another agent for this purpose.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
	This Agreement has been entered into on the date stated at the beginning of this Agreement.
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAKAREA" STYLE="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10PT; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN-TOP: 10PT">
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEFOOTER">
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<DIV ID="DSPFPAGENUMBERAREA" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 8PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT">

</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>

	Conditions Precedent
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="DCC87EFF58434E3B95B6950F32869DC4" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

	1
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	Security Parties
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="ACD35C69A5D44990A94DFB44F7F0E159" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Constitutional documents&#160;
</FONT>
	Copies of the constitutional documents of each Security Party and DSI together with such other evidence as the Agent may reasonably require that each such Security Party and DSI is duly incorporated in its country of incorporation and remains in existence with power to enter into, and perform its obligations under, the Finance Documents to which it is or is to become a party.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F496DDEE48E14B5F90759738236E031F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Certificates of good standing
</FONT>
	A certificate of good standing in respect of each Security Party and DSI (if such a certificate can be obtained).
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<DIV ID="DSPFPAGEBREAK" STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: ALWAYS">
<HR STYLE="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0PX; HEIGHT: 2PX; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0PX; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0PX; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: BOTH; MARGIN: 4PX 0PX; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0PX; WIDTH: 100%; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" NOSHADE="NOSHADE">
</DIV>
<A NAME="eolPage278"></A>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 72PT; MARGIN-RIGHT: 3.6PT">
	to which it is or is to become a party are to be executed or transactions undertaken by that Security Party or (as the case may be) DSI.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="01E70C740864482C9F0651D1F593855F" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	2
</TD>

</FONT>
	Evidence that on the Drawdown Date (i) the Vessel will be at least provisionally registered under the flag stated in the Preliminary in the ownership of the Borrower and (ii) the Mortgage will be capable of being registered against the Vessel with first priority.

</TD>

</FONT>
	Evidence that the Vessel is insured in the manner required by the Security Documents and that letters of undertaking will be issued in the manner required by the Security Documents, together with (if required by the Agent) the written approval of the Insurances by an insurance adviser appointed by the Agent.

</TR>

	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

</TD>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Confirmation of class&#160;
</FONT>
	A Certificate of Confirmation of Class for hull and machinery confirming that the Vessel is classed with the highest class applicable to vessels of her type with Nippon Kaiji Kyokai, DNV GL, Bureau Veritas, American Bureau of Shipping, Lloyd's Register, The Korean Register of Shipping, China Classification Society or such other classification society as may be acceptable to the Agent free of recommendations affecting class.

</TR>
</TABLE>

	&#160;

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="E867037DB6AD4AE4B6B485C74C724D2C" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>

</FONT>
	If the Collateral Owner has acceded to this Agreement pursuant to Clause 25.2.1, a valuation of the Collateral Vessel addressed to the Agent from an Approved Broker appointed by the Agent certifying the Market Value for the Collateral Vessel, acceptable to the Agent.

</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F9FC8AB44F83465D84F72640902EEE31" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; WIDTH: 36PT; ALIGN: RIGHT">
	(i)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Security Documents&#160;
</FONT>
	The Guarantee, the Mortgage, the Assignment, the Share Pledges, the Manager's Undertakings in respect of each Vessel, the Account Security Deeds, the Master Agreement Proceeds Charges and any other Credit Support Documents, together with all other documents required by any of them, including, without limitation (i) all notices of assignment and/or charge and evidence that those notices will be duly acknowledged by the recipients and (ii) all share certificates, certified copy share registers or registers of members, transfer forms, proxy forms, letters of resignation and letters of undertaking.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="F0922205AB7845C2B86698911D59A97B" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH: 36PT">
</TD>

	(a)
</TD>
<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	the maturity date of the DSI Loan shall be at least six months after the Termination Date;
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="880A1202AA83415D910B89CCEF83CB6A" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<DIV>

<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 47.73%">

	[Existing Lender]
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; WIDTH: 52.27%">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; COLOR: #000000; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">

<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<TABLE ID="43DEB390089A4BE4B3341930586DCD29" CLASS="DSPFLISTTABLE" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; WIDTH: 100%" CELLSPACING="0" CELLPADDING="0">

<TD STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; VERTICAL-ALIGN: TOP; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; WIDTH: AUTO">
	We refer to the Agreement. This deed (the "
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	Accession Deed
</FONT>
	") shall take effect as a Swap Provider Accession Deed for the purposes of the Agreement. Terms defined in the Agreement have the same meaning in paragraphs 1-3 of this Swap Provider Accession Deed unless given a different meaning in this Swap Provider Accession Deed.
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>

	&#160;

	of the Agreement.

	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
	Attention:
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY; MARGIN-LEFT: 36PT">
	This Swap Provider Accession Deed and any non-contractual obligations arising out of or in connection with it are governed by English law.
</DIV>
<DIV>
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: JUSTIFY">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD">
	This Swap Provider Accession Deed
</FONT>
	has been executed as a deed on behalf of the Acceding Swap Provider, the Agent and the Security Agent and is delivered on the date stated above.
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage303"></A>
<A NAME="D7077134_EX12-1_HTM"></A>
<EFX_EXHIBIT_12>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_12"></A>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: RIGHT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Exhibit 12.1
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<U>
	CERTIFICATION OF THE PRINCIPAL EXECUTIVE OFFICER
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	I, Symeon Palios, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	1. I have reviewed this annual report on Form 20-F of Diana Containerships Inc.;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	2. Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	3. Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	4. The company's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the company and have:
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(b) Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(c) Evaluated the effectiveness of the company's disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(d) Disclosed in this report any change in the company's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the company's internal control over financial reporting; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	5. The company's other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the company's auditors and the audit committee of the company's board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(a) All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the company's ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	(b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the company's internal control over financial reporting.
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Date: March 21, 2016
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 13.7PT">
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
<U>
	/s/ Symeon Palios
</U>
</FONT>

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Symeon Palios
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
	Chief Executive Officer (Principal Executive Officer)
</DIV>

<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_12_2"></A>
<DIV>

	Exhibit 12.2
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER; LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
<U>
<BR STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT: 11.4PT">
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
<U>
	CERTIFICATION OF THE PRINCIPAL FINANCIAL OFFICER
</U>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
	&#160;
</DIV>
<DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; FONT-WEIGHT: BOLD; TEXT-ALIGN: CENTER">
</DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<DIV STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF; TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
	I, Andreas Michalopoulos, certify that:
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.14PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	I have reviewed this annual report on Form 20-F of Diana Containerships Inc.;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.14PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	3.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.14PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the company as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	4.
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.14PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	The company's other certifying officer(s) and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the company and have:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.14PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the company, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT ID="TRGRRTFTOHTMLTAB" STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 5.14PT">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	(d)

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">
	Disclosed in this report any change in the company's internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the period covered by the annual report that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the company's internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV>
<BR>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-SIZE: 10PT; FONT-FAMILY: 'TIMES NEW ROMAN', TIMES, SERIF">

</FONT>

<DIV>

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN: LEFT; TEXT-INDENT: 36PT">
